name: Regolith
description:
Hi, this is an early version of this game! Download might require some extra dlls, comment if you have any issues and I can help you with that. I would appreciate if you could leave some feedback on game feel. I'm not sure if the enemies/player are too small, the player seems hard to find sometimes. I think the health system is too easy to not die for a while, but then randomly you'll get 1 shot. I don't really like that but let me know. Thanks :)

Known bugs:

  • Enemies don't collide with asteroids
  • Player can sometimes get inside of the asteroids
  • There is a band about 1/3 of the middle of the screen that draws the tiles differently than the edges?? They are slightly smushed...
